mapper.insert: insert into order_head (head_id, packagecode, member_id, create_date, order_type, sizecategory_id, pay_status, order_price, order_reality_price, pay_type, pay_date, pay_price, member_name, member_tel, province, city, county, street,pay_num ) values (#{headId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packagecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sizecategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderRealityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{payNum} )
mapper.update: update order_head set packagecode = #{packagecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sizecategory_id = #{sizecategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_reality_price = #{orderRealityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_tel = #{memberTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_num=#{payNum} where head_id = #{headId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select head_id, packagecode, member_id, create_date, order_type, sizecategory_id, pay_status, order_price, order_reality_price, pay_type, pay_date, pay_price, member_name, member_tel, province, city, county, street,pay_num from order_head where head_id = #{headId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select head_id, packagecode, member_id, create_date, order_type, sizecategory_id, pay_status, order_price, order_reality_price, pay_type, pay_date, pay_price, member_name, member_tel, province, city, county, street,pay_num from order_head
